about_the_game: This demo will contain the entirety of the base game until the game is fully released. The reason for this is because I want the game to be avaliable to as many people as possible, while also allowing for people to buy the game, similar to a donation, if you enjoy the content I provide or plan to provide for the game. Eventually, the community will be required to purchase the game and the demo will cease being updated, but for a long while will be the exact same as the purchased copy.
